name: Destination Level Design
description:
Destination: Level Design is a project with a single-minded goal, to learn how to create good platformer levels, to that end I've created a basic platformer and level editor, which are now both functional and so here we are. As I work on this project I'll be keeping this prototype updated for people to check out if they're interested and provide any feedback they might have which would aid me considerably in this journey. So, if you check it out and have any comments or criticisms I'd love to hear them! Thanks! and if you want to stay updated on the project head on over to my Twitter

Controls: 

- Use the mouse to interact with menus,

- "A" and "D" to move left and right respectfully

- Spacebar to jump

- There's a basic tutorial implemented to help get you up to speed
